title: Can't make special game mode custom games on the new client
body: I really want to play ascension in custom, but for some reason it only shows Summoner's Rift, ARAM, and Twisted Treeline as options for custom games. How come I see other people are able to make special game mode custom games but I can't? Or am I not the only one who can't make special game mode custom games and that's why I see nobody making them? The Legacy Client is already retired so I don't see a way that I can play my special game modes in custom anymore.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: For the time being it doesn't look like you're able to create custom games with the Rotating Game Mode. I'm not 100% sure if we'll ever be adding those special game modes into the custom game section since they aren't available consistently.
And how to play Find the Teemo and any other funny Custom Game Modes?Please add this function.And please bring Dominion back I miss dominion so much. :D
